    • Method Detail

      • acquireKeyspace

        public com.netflix.astyanax.Keyspace acquireKeyspace(java.lang.String schemaName)
        Description copied from interface: KeyspaceClientProvider
        Get a keyspace by name. Will create one if one does not exist. The provider will internally keep track of references to the keyspace and will auto remove it once releaseKeyspace is called and the reference count goes down to 0.
        Specified by:
        acquireKeyspace in interface KeyspaceClientProvider
        Returns:
        A new or previously created keyspace.
